code: export default function getLanguageFields(languages,data){let fields=arguments.length>2&&arguments[2]!==undefined?arguments[2]:['title'];if(!data){return{};}const{translations}=data;const getTranslations=(item,field)=>{const findItem=translations.find(el=>el.locale===item.locale);if(findItem){return findItem;}else{return{[field]:''};}};const result=languages.flatMap(item=>fields.flatMap(field=>({[`${field}[${item.locale}]`]:getTranslations(item,field)[field]})));return Object.assign({},...result);}
